title: Lagging=Low priority queue
body:
Please help me riot, I have been put in low priority queue all because I had bad internet in this one game. It's a 20 minutes one and I don't know why I have been put in the low priority queue because I only disconnected at the start of the game and then I joined back at 12 minutes because I had fixed my internet. If there is anything you can do to help me please respond or get rid of my low priority queue that would really make life easier.

In advance thanks for reading my post. :)

replies.body: I hate this i have been it in low priority queue because i got a power cut this is very annoying because i reconnected after
